trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The overzealous Nu Mou is burning for your patronage.
TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_TODO_00<tab>Question the residents of Pla Enni.
TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the overzealous Nu Mou.
TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_TODO_02<tab>Use the hempen sack to capture a weakened echevore.
TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_TODO_03<tab>Deliver the echevore to the overzealous Nu Mou.
TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_ENTHUSIATICNUMOU03417_000_000<tab>Ahhh! A mortal! It's a mortal! Please give me your patronage! Please, please, <var 1A 02 /var>please<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_ENTHUSIATICNUMOU03417_000_001<tab>You won't regret it, I swear! Just tell me what your troubles are, and I will solve them! Yes, make them disappear!
TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_ENTHUSIATICNUMOU03417_000_002<tab>What!? You don't have any troubles!? Gah, what am I to do!? I can't afford to let this opportunity slip by!
TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_ENTHUSIATICNUMOU03417_000_003<tab>Please help me, I beg you! Go and ask the others what I must do to win your patronage!
TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_ENTHUSIATICNUMOU03417_000_004<tab>I can't afford to let this opportunity slip by! Please, go and ask the others what I must do to win your patronage!

TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_DAENKENN_000_010<tab>They wish to know how they might win <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> patronage? If you yourself do not know, there is little and less chance that someone else would.
TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_OSESIGUN_000_011<tab>Well, never have I heard of such a naive Nu Mou! All know that patronage cannot be forced. Nay, it must come about naturally, arise out of necessity.
TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_GYUFDAEN_000_012<tab>Our friend is being too hasty. It's well and good to desire honor, but one mustn't obsess over it. Tell them they could stand to relax a little.

TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_DAENKENN_000_013<tab>They wish to know how they might win <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> patronage? If you yourself do not know, there is little and less chance that someone else would.
TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_OSESIGUN_000_014<tab>Well, never have I heard of such a naive Nu Mou! All know that patronage cannot be forced. Nay, it must come about naturally, arise out of necessity.
TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_GYUFDAEN_000_015<tab>Our friend is being too hasty. It's well and good to desire honor, but one mustn't obsess over it. Tell them they could stand to relax a little.
TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_ENTHUSIATICNUMOU03417_000_020<tab>Did you learn how I might win your patronage? Oh, please tell me you did!

TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_ENTHUSIATICNUMOU03417_000_021<tab>Is...is that what they said? Perhaps they're right. Perhaps I've been too obsessed with honor and I need to relax. And I know the perfect way to do that!
TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_ENTHUSIATICNUMOU03417_000_022<tab>I need an echevore! Please, go and catch one for me!
TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_ENTHUSIATICNUMOU03417_000_023<tab>Spirited as the creature is, it's like to put up a fight. You must weaken it first before slipping this sack over it!
TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_ENTHUSIATICNUMOU03417_000_024<tab>Please, catch an echevore for me! Remember, you must weaken it first and then slip the sack over it!
TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_ENTHUSIATICNUMOU03417_000_030<tab>Ah, the mortal returns...and with the echevore, I hope!?

TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_ENTHUSIATICNUMOU03417_000_031<tab>Oooh, such a lusty specimen! I shall enjoy sucking on its tail for that sweet, sweet nectar taste! There's no better way to relax, let me tell you!

TEXT_LUCKZD010_03417_ENTHUSIATICNUMOU03417_000_032<tab>But wait... By bringing this to me, you've done me a service. And by giving you a fitting payment, it becomes─<gasp>─an honorable task! I might not have <var 1A 02 /var>performed<var 1A 01 /var> the task, but I was <var 1A 02 /var>party<var 1A 01 /var> to it! And near enough is good enough! Ahahaha!
